metadata.dc:title: Communication and participation of professionals
metadata.dc:description: In this article, the author presents the Communication Plan set up in the entity the represents and which has been a source of quality and confidence in the organization, and consequently, has gained he loyalty and commitment of its user, that is, the patients (AU)
